I need to check how much my friend sent me, so I will first get my current account balance (or at least the recent transactions). Then, I'll calculate the difference between what they sent and what they should have sent.

The amount they sent appears to be more than what was spent (12.00), but without knowing the exact amount they sent, I need another approach. <|python_end|>
